exec: pm.test('we can retrieve programme languages', function() {

console.log('There is input language ' + inputLanguage.code + ' enabled, we will use this during test');
pm.test('we can retrieve programme priorities', function() {
pm.test('we have programme priority or we need to create one', function() {
console.log('There is already a policy ' + policy + ', which we will use for calls during this test');
console.log('There is already a programme priority, but no policy. We have to create one.');
console.log('There are no any programme priorities yet. We need to create one.');

item.name: [IF] not exists, then create programme priority with policy

exec: console.log('There is no any programme priority policy we can use, so we need to create one.');
console.log('There is already a programme priority with policy, so we will use that one.');
pm.test('programme priority was created if needed', function() {
console.log('We did an invalid POST to NOT create new programme priority, no variable is changing.');
pm.test('we can retrieve programme funds', function() {
pm.test('we have programme fund or we need to enable first one', function() {
console.log('There is fund wth id ' + fundId);
console.log('There are no any programme funds yet enabled. We need to enable one.');

item.name: [IF] not exists, then enable programme fund 1

exec: console.log('There is no any programme fund enabled we can use, so we need to enable one.');
console.log('There is already a programme fund enabled, so we will use that one.');
console.log('We did an invalid POST to NOT enable new programme funds, no variable is changing.');
pm.test('we can retrieve programme lump sums', function() {
pm.test('we have programme lump sum or we need to create one', function() {
console.log('There is already a lumpSum ' + response[0].name + ' with id=' + response[0].id + ', which we will use for calls during this test');
console.log('There are no any programme lumpSums yet. We need to create one.');

item.name: [IF] not exists, then create splittable programme lumpSum

exec: console.log('There is no any programme lump sum we can use, so we need to create one.');
console.log('There is already a programme lump sum, so we will use that one.');
pm.test('programme lump sum was created (as it was needed)', function() {

console.log('We did an invalid POST to NOT create new lump sum.');
